mapper.select: select dmcs.id,dmcs.main_symp_code,dmcs.disease_code,dmcs.conc_symp_code,dmcs.symp_spec,dmcs.rate,dmcs.default_order, dcs.symp_name,dcs.popu_name,dcs.symbol,dcs.gender,dcs.min_age,dcs.max_age,dcs.display_type from diagnosis_mainsymp_concsymp dmcs INNER JOIN diagnosis_concomitant_symptom dcs on(dcs.symp_code=dmcs.conc_symp_code) where dmcs.main_symp_code=#{mainSympCode} group by dmcs.conc_symp_code
